reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there because Swiss Porsche clubs were racing that weekend. Our room was very nice, but both the walk-in shower and the sink suffered from water pressure problems. The shower couldn’t be completely on hand-spray and the rain shower head went scalding hot and then quite cold every few minutes.
reviews.title: A very nice hotel

reviews.text: Dinner at the hotel our first night -- food good, service terrible, in an almost empty restaurant. My French comprehension may not be the best, but we couldn't understand a single word the waiter said. He opened the wine and poured over the side of the glass for the taste and for both first servings. We ordered a 2011 Provencal wine and he gave us a 2008. We complained about this at the desk and received an apology and a free aperitif.
reviews.title: Very good place to stay when you go racing. Price is right for the quality!

reviews.text: We had tried to book dinner at the San Felice restaurant at the other hotel in town on our second night, but it was fully booked. I was leery about eating at our hotel’s restaurant again because I was sure the waiter would be spitting in our food, but he wasn’t there. Instead, the waiter who served our wine was completely inept -- he only twisted the corkscrew twice and, of course, couldn’t pull out the cork. It broke, then he tried to remove the rest of the cork with great effort and finally succeeded. He was so flustered that he put the bottle in the ice bag without pouring a taste or serving. Dinner was good, again, and there were more diners, making it more pleasant.
reviews.title: Very good option in the area!

reviews.text: The hotel is IDEALLY situate next to the track. Everything is clean and well done. You cannot ask for anything else then this when you are on a racing or track day weekend. Even the food is good.
reviews.title: fast track to comfort

reviews.text: The bar is also very convenient. No need to drive ours to have a good drink and fun with friends.
reviews.title: Good, but remote and expensive
